msbt.message: This whole place is all me. I just can't get comfy unless I've got my favorite things nearby.Like they say, "Home is where your stuff is."

Whaddaya think? <20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I absolutely love my . It's so comfy!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Doesn't matter what kind of day I've had, the instant I fall into this bad boyI'm out like a light.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I've been watching soooo many shopping shows on my .The hosts are hilarious. They always get so excited over the tiniest little things. I'm kinda hooked!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm also broke right now, so I don't even THINK about buying anything, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />There is NOTHING better than cranking some on my .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />My parents used to complain about the noise soooo much, but they're not here now! Bwa ha ha!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm terrible at being on time to stuff, but stillI hate needing .Don't get me wrong, <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm still late all the time, but now I'm actually trying, !
Plants are so awesome. You get out exactly what you put in. If they're doing well, you're doing well!I take care of my own!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> Just look at my , growin' like mad.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I like to grab a book to read in my .<20_3 arg="3" />Sometimes I'll turn on the water and start reading, <20_3 arg="6" />and the next thing I know, it'll be overflowing.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />When you need a place to pile up your unopened mail,<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> nothing beats .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />When it comes to looking rad, nothing can beat my !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But when it comes to being comfy to sit onnot so much, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm gonna get this out of the way That was a gift. Don't ask me to play .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />It's too bad, 'cause I really wanted to learn. I tried! ButI just didn't stick with it, .
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I'm so glad I got .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />Whipping something up is a breeze, . Cooking's a blast now!
<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I really wish I used my more often, .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Staying fit's tough, y'know? I just can't seem to make it a habit, but I keep trying!

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />I do a ton of gardening, so I know which outdoor stuff is worth it, like ! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And yeah, my place looks kinda weird with outdoor stuff indoors, but trust meâ€”it's awesome, !
